message: We've been in this desert so long I have sand stuck in my halo!
What? No way. The heat must be getting to me... or maybe it's all this sand stuck in my— COUGH- throat.
Saints above, you're winded from talking.
Blegh. Anyways, remind me why we're in this AWFUL place again?
Orders from the Holy See. Too many demonic reports out here—smells like a new Hellrift.
You mean that *adorable* thing over there?
No. That's what crawled *out* of one.
Oh come on, that thing's way too cute to be evil!
You'll learn fast — even demons can wear friendly faces. *grips sword* First test of the desert. Ready yourself.
Death to the cute demon! …Hold on, let me just— COUGH— okay, ready!
